questions.question: What is the brain of the computer?
questions.explanation: CPU processes all instructions and data.

questions.question: What stores data permanently?
questions.explanation: Hard drives retain data when powered off.

questions.question: What displays visual output?
questions.explanation: Monitors display images and text visually.

questions.question: What is the main circuit board?
What provides temporary storage?
questions.explanation: RAM stores data temporarily while running.

questions.question: What handles graphics processing?
questions.explanation: GPUs accelerate graphics and video rendering.

questions.question: What supplies power to components?
questions.explanation: PSU converts AC power to DC.

questions.question: What cools the processor?
questions.explanation: Heat sinks dissipate CPU heat effectively.

questions.question: What provides faster storage than HDD?
questions.explanation: SSDs use flash memory for speed.

questions.question: What houses all computer components?
questions.explanation: Cases protect and organize hardware components.
